item.title: 0940 DAL
item.description: score:940 Chances: Delta Air Lines could benefit from the rise in international travel demand as more Americans are opting for longer journeys overseas. Strong leisure travel demand is positive for U.S. airlines, including Delta Air Lines, as the market begins to recover from notable losses.
